featured.text: You may experience the discomfort from the motion of cars, boats, or amusement park rides.
You can take some 19 to help avoid the discomfort.
Many great forms of exercise—like walking, swimming, or gentle stretching—get results without the 38 or discomfort some people associate with exercise.

definition.zh_def: 不適，身體或心理上的不舒服感。
definition.en_def: A state of unease or mild pain, either physically or mentally.
definition.example: She felt a sense of discomfort during the long meeting.
